definitions.text: something determined in relation to something that includes it
examples: he wanted to feel a part of something bigger than himself
I read a portion of the manuscript
the smaller component is hard to reach
the animal constituent of plankton

definitions.text: something less than the whole of a human artifact
examples: the rear part of the house
glue the two parts together

definitions.text: a portion of a natural object
examples: they analyzed the river into three parts
he needed a piece of granite

definitions.text: that which concerns a person with regard to a particular role or situation
examples: it requires vigilance on our part
they resisted every effort on his part

definitions.text: the extended spatial location of something
examples: the farming regions of France
religions in all parts of the world
regions of outer space

definitions.text: the actions and activities assigned to or required or expected of a person or group
examples: the function of a teacher
the government must do its part
play its role

definitions.text: an actor's portrayal of someone in a play
examples: she played the part of Desdemona

definitions.text: assets belonging to or due to or contributed by an individual person or group
examples: he wanted his share in cash

definitions.text: one of the portions into which something is regarded as divided and which together constitute a whole
examples: the written part of the exam
the finance section of the company
the BBC's engineering division

definitions.text: a line of scalp that can be seen when sections of hair are combed in opposite directions
examples: his part was right in the middle

definitions.text: the melody carried by a particular voice or instrument in polyphonic music
examples: he tried to sing the tenor part

definitions.text: the part played by a person in bringing about a result
examples: I am proud of my contribution in advancing the project
they all did their share of the work

definitions.text: go one's own way; move apart
examples: The friends separated after the party

definitions.text: discontinue an association or relation; go different ways
examples: The business partners broke over a tax question
The couple separated after 25 years of marriage
My friend and I split up
The family took off for Florida
The two pieces that we had glued separated
He separated the fighting children
Moses parted the Red Sea

definitions.text: in part; in some degree; not wholly
examples: I felt partly to blame
He was partially paralyzed
